Bug.title: Expose replication agents actions  and information via HTTP.
Fix agent isPassive (reverse replication) checks
Replication queue servlet doesn't use the queue parameter
Avoid NPE in FileVaultReplicationPackage due to missing File for VLT package
Fix wrong /system/replication endpoints in http and poll transport configs
Sling Jobs based queue looks always empty
Reenable multiple endpoints replication and multiple polling packages
Provide basic ui for replication agents
Exporter/importer/trigger endpoints are not reachable
FV package builder factory is not an OSGi factory
Replication ITs do not start correctly
Compact agent factory suffers from order of dependent services
Removing from JobHandlingReplicationQueue uses the wrong id
Remove password information for accesing content from config files
Replication package events should always be generated
Avoiding loops when syncing via coordinate agents
Multiple endpoint delivery should be fault tolerant
Basic auth fails if preemptive auth needed
Warning about unset VLT package version when using Sling replication
Do not create Jcr packages when filevault is used
Have a package builder based on JcrPackages
Create specific factories for pubsync agents and queuing agents
Sling replication deleting ACLs nodes
JcrEventTrigger uses the path of the property in case of property events
Failed remote import should be reported with an HTTP status accordingly
Cleanup Sling Replication APIs
org.apache.sling.replication.util not exported
ReplicationQueueProvider should not create or remove queues
Persisting event trigger should automatically create nuggets path
Jcr event triggers session is closed prematurely
OSGi event class should not be extended
A lot of interfaces are marked as ConsumerType
Remote importer should throw an exception if transport fails
Cleanup Sling Content Distribution APIs
DistributionQueueDispatchingStrategy.add should return QueueItemStates
Add config factory for Repository package importer
Refactor the resourceprovider that allows access to distribution configs and distribution services
Fix wrong cardinalities in agent factories
Expose agent queue items as Sling Resources
Disable trigger method does not unregister trigger
Change the ResourceProviderFactory for services into a simple ResourceProvider
Add description to all distribution osgi fields
NODE_MOVED event not handled correctly in distribution event trigger
Ensure that distribution triggers work well in clustered environments
Prefix all distribution related configuration labels with Apache

Improvement.title: Implement suggestions from SLING-3223 in Sling replication
Add a scheduled replication rule
PollingTransportHandler should have a configurable no. of consecutive polls
Remote agent queue poll should be restricted as "queueing" agents
Add an API to create replication agent (configuration)
Allow flushing of external caching systems
Refactor replication HTTP API
Remove packages after being processed
Allow asynchronous package import
Add ability to replicate to multiple enpoints
Expose OSGI configuration via HTTP
Expose the import queue for reverse replication through ReplicationAgent interface
Event based reverse replication
JobHandlingReplicationQueue reports failed Job.toString
ReplicationAgent runMode should be controlled by configuration properties
PollingTransportHandler should log connection errors
Use the same flow of operations for forward and reverse replication
Cleanup ReplicationAgent interface and ReplicationAgentConfiguration
Cleanup log.isLevelEnabled log statements where not needed
Reorganize ReplicationPackage related API in a single java package
Configure continous event polling using exclusively the rule string
Create ReplicationTriggers as a HTTP accessible variant of a ReplicationRule
Add replication agent factory that can create an agent and its components from a single configuration file
Access content for replication on behalf of the user that triggered the replication
Replication transport authenticators should hide the credentials
Allow configuration of triggers in agent configuration file
Add a repository package importer
Refactor ReplicationQueue API to eliminate multiagent queues
Export TransportAuthenticationProvider and ReplicationComponentProvider from replication bundle
Separate configuration from 'core' into a 'sample' bundle
Create a dedicated factory for coordinate agents
Simplify dependency management by letting the caller to supply its own implementations
Move all osgi factories in replication.sample
Create a JcrEventTrigger
Add export packages with semantic versioning to Sling replication
In case of coordinate agent avoid replicating back to the originating instance
Replication Component Factory should declare the properties it accepts for building a component
Expose option to configure replication of JCR ACLs
Use safe ids for replication packages such that an user cannot access random files on disk
Split Sling Distribution Core into API and Core bundles
Create individual factories for distribution triggers
Expose distribution agent status
Add a TEST distribution request type
Refactor DistributionEvent API to contain topics as constants in order to be usable in annotations
Remove distribution settings stored in JCR
Permit that distribution agents can be configured for a particular root
In distribution servlets use sling.commons.json to build json responses

Test.title: Adding test for replication config delete
Add tests for replication between author and publish

Task.title: Donation of a replication module for Sling
Remove old agents in agents directory
Expose more information on the replication queues
Use a released parent POM in Sling Replication
Change artifact name from org.apache.sling.replication to org.apache.sling.replication.core
Rename Sling Replication to Sling Content Distribution
Discuss distribution components creation and configuration
